title: Real-World Assets on Blockchain Hit $1 Trillion – BlackRock Leads Tokenization
shortdescription: Real estate, bonds, and art now tradable 24/7 on-chain with instant settlement.
description: BlackRock's BUIDL fund crosses $500B, UBS tokenizes $200B in bonds — traditional finance officially moves on-chain.
author: Gwen John

title: Bitcoin ETFs Smash $50 Billion Inflows in 2025 – BlackRock Leads the Charge
shortdescription: Institutional money floods crypto as spot Bitcoin ETFs become the fastest-growing product ever.
description: BlackRock’s IBIT alone crosses $25B AUM – total Bitcoin ETF assets now exceed gold ETFs in record time.
author: Emma Chen

title: Berkshire Hathaway Reveals Charlie Munger's Successor – Markets React
shortdescription: Greg Abel + two new vice chairs named — Buffett confirms retirement timeline.
description: Warren Buffett announces Greg Abel as official successor at 2025 shareholder meeting — shares up 3% on clarity.
author: Mark Blaze

title: OpenAI Hits $5 Trillion Valuation After GPT-5 Launch – Bigger Than Apple
shortdescription: Sam Altman becomes world's first trillionaire as investors pour $500B in new round.
description: GPT-5 passes every human benchmark — Microsoft, Nvidia, and sovereign funds fight for allocation in largest private funding round ever.
author: Gwen John
